name: Scraps & Wires
description:
Help this old robot to escape from a junkyard and win his freedom, with the help of your console. Use your control panel and pick up components along the way to beat the puzzles and reach the end before your battery runs out. 

This game was made for the OneButtonJam in 7 days!

How to play

Use mouse movement and left click to click on panel buttons, rewire and change the components. Press and hold the power button to make the character keep working. You can click on battery-connected components to grab the wire and connect to another component. You can take out the screws to change the components.
